body: http://jade-lang.com/ is up. They had to rename jade to pug due to some legal concern, and the migrating is still in progress. Once it done pug-lang.com will be up.
pug-lang.com shows a site about dogs. Maybe grab the .org?
pug-lang.com shows me the default Namecheap page because the site is not configured yet. The puppies you see are ads.
Hey I have pug-lang.com.  Sorry about that - I want to give it to this project.  Who do I transfer it to?
Okay, I reached out to him and I'll try and get that domain moved over as soon as possible.
I would be fine with transferring the domain to @bloodyowl, @hemanth, @jbnicolai, @rlidwka, @TimothyGu, or @tjconcept.

repository.name: pug
repository.description: Pug  robust, elegant, feature rich template engine for Node.js
